label: Kaźmierski, Andrzej & Justyna Dończyk.  2003. Two new free living mite species of Eustigmaeus (Actinedida: Raphignathoidea: Stigmaeidae) from Poland, with new data of some other rare species of the genus. Zootaxa 198: 1-16.
value: Kaźmierski, Andrzej & Justyna Dończyk.  2003. Two new free living mite species of Eustigmaeus (Actinedida: Raphignathoidea: Stigmaeidae) from Poland, with new data of some other rare species of the genus. Zootaxa 198: 1-16.
title: Two new free living mite species of Eustigmaeus (Actinedida: Raphignathoidea: Stigmaeidae) from Poland, with new data of some other rare species of the genus.
